DOC.brief_summary: This observational study assess experience current depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) intramuscular ( IM ) client provider try Depo-subQ Uniject offer recommendation introduction method .
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study assess experience current depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) intramuscular ( IM ) client provider try Depo-subQ Uniject offer recommendation introduction method . A total 560 participant enrol study follow group : 360 participant ( 120 Uganda 240 Senegal ) current DMPA IM client seek re-injection DMPA either community health worker ( CHWs ) clinic-based provider ; 18-40 year age ; receive recent DMPA injection 13 week prior enrollment study [ 16 ] . Up 100 participant ( 50 Uganda 50 Senegal ) current DMPA IM client meet inclusion/exclusion criterion want receive injection Depo-subQ Uniject willing complete short questionnaire 80 CHWs ( 40 Uganda 40 Senegal ) 20 clinic-based provider ( Senegal ) train give Depo-subQ Uniject part study
DOC.criteria: Age 1840 In general good health ( participant verbally report feel well ) Using DMPA continuously least six month prior enrollment study ( i.e. , least two previous injection ) Received recent DMPA injection 13 week prior enrollment study study clinic family plan provider involve study ( Senegal ) Received recent DMPA injection 13 week prior enrollment study family plan provider involve study ( Uganda ) Desires reinjected DMPA Willing sign inform consent document Willing provide contact information interview three month enrollment .
DOC.keyword: HB sAg Hepatitis B surface antigen
